name: Osteya: Adventures
description:
** App Store Best of 2016 **

Take part in an ambitious adventure into the mysterious world of Osteya! Journey through over 100+ levels and try to unravel the secret of the forgotten city. But be careful! On your adventure you will encounter dark corners crawling with dangerous creatures. Use the whip, your dexterity and skills to protect yourself! What are you waiting for?

- Fast, dynamic and exciting gameplay
- 100+ levels full of adventures and danger
- Enchanting handcrafted pixel art
- Monthly updates
- Pay once & play
- 16 Game Center Achievements & Leaderboar
- 3D Touch, iCloud Save, ReplayKit

=======

"Terraria-meets-Indiana Jones feel" - Pocket Gamer

"Osteya: Adventures looks like a much more refined platformer" - Touch Arcade
